description.value: At 8th level, when entering a bloodrage, you can choose one manufactured weapon you wield, shield you wield, or piece of armor you wear to gain the benefit of @Compendium[pf1.spells.zq7xi7l5vgpqu7rt]{Magic Weapon, Greater} (weapon) or @Compendium[pf1.spells.73han2zqxg59u18g]{Magic Vestment}. The caster level of this effect is equal to your bloodrager level, and its effects end when your bloodrage ends or when you no longer wear or wield the weapon, shield, or armor.
